# Kernel

## Kernel

**Status:** ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue)

**type:** `kernel`

**Description:** The kernel on which the os represented by this resource is using.

**Attributes:**

| Role | Key | Stability | [Requirement Level](https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/general/attribute-requirement-level/) | Value Type | Description | Example Values |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Identity | [`kernel.name`](/docs/registry/attributes/kernel.md) | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `Required` | string | The kernel name. [1] | `Linux`; `Darwin` |
| Identity | [`kernel.version`](/docs/registry/attributes/kernel.md) | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `Recommended` | string | The kernel version. [2] | `#43~22.04.1-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Fri Apr 21 16:51:08 UTC 2` |
| Description | [`kernel.release`](/docs/registry/attributes/kernel.md) | ![Development](https://img.shields.io/badge/-development-blue) | `Recommended` | string | The kernel release. [3] | `5.19.0-42-generic` |

**[1] `kernel.name`:** This is to be the output of uname -s.

**[2] `kernel.version`:** This is to be the output of uname -v.

**[3] `kernel.release`:** This is to be the output of uname -r.
